fields.title: ID
fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique document ID

fields.title: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The text title of your document

fields.title: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of your document, used for SEO meta tags

fields.title: Keywords
fields.name: keywords
fields.description: Keywords meta tag for the document page, for search engines

fields.title: Image
fields.name: image
fields.description: Cover or thumbnail image for social media previews

fields.title: Slug
fields.name: slug
fields.description: Customize the document URL

fields.title: Draft
fields.name: draft
fields.description: Draft documents are only available during development

fields.title: Unlisted
fields.name: unlisted
fields.description: Unlisted documents are hidden but accessible via direct link

fields.title: Sidebar Label
fields.name: sidebar_label
fields.description: The text shown in the document sidebar

fields.title: Sidebar Position
fields.name: sidebar_position
fields.description: Controls the position in the generated sidebar

fields.title: Sidebar Class Name
fields.name: sidebar_class_name
fields.description: CSS class name for the sidebar label

fields.title: Pagination Label
fields.name: pagination_label
fields.description: Text used in the document next/previous buttons

fields.title: Pagination Next
fields.name: pagination_next
fields.description: ID of the next document in pagination

fields.title: Pagination Previous
fields.name: pagination_prev
fields.description: ID of the previous document in pagination

fields.title: Hide Title
fields.name: hide_title
fields.description: Whether to hide the title at the top of the doc

fields.title: Hide Table of Contents
fields.name: hide_table_of_contents
fields.description: Whether to hide the table of contents

fields.title: TOC Min Heading Level
fields.name: toc_min_heading_level
fields.description: Minimum heading level shown in TOC (2-6)

fields.title: TOC Max Heading Level
fields.name: toc_max_heading_level
fields.description: Maximum heading level shown in TOC (2-6)

fields.title: Custom Edit URL
fields.name: custom_edit_url
fields.description: Custom URL for editing this document

fields.title: Parse Number Prefixes
fields.name: parse_number_prefixes
fields.description: Whether number prefix parsing is enabled

fields.title: Displayed Sidebar
fields.name: displayed_sidebar
fields.description: Force display of a specific sidebar

fields.description: The blog post title

fields.title: Title Meta
fields.name: title_meta
fields.description: SEO metadata title for <head>, used when displayed title and SEO title should differ

fields.title: Tags
